prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with sharp claws and a fierce demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of speed and power.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek, aerodynamic body and vibrant colors.
Design a ground-type creature with a rugged appearance and strong wings.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has a unique roar.
Give me a Pokemon that looks intimidating yet has a playful side.
Make a Pokemon with both dragon and ground characteristics, showcasing a fierce battle stance.
